article_title: Teva Gets FDA Approval For Cancer Drug
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: teva, gets, fda, approval, cancer, drug

og.description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration approved an injectable and infusion version of the drugmaker's cancer drug, bendamustine.
og.title: Teva Gets FDA Approval For Cancer Drug
